snippet.title: Santa's Xmas Adventure (Nintendo Switch) Game [Code in Box] - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
★ Perfect stocking filler ★
★ Nintendo Switch Lite Compatible ★
★ Christmas based fun for the whole family ★



Release Date: 6th November 2020
SRP: £14.99
EAN: 5055377603946



Product Description
Santa had an accident! He lost his way, and all the gifts. Help him get to his goal by sliding tiles to form a path.

A classic puzzle game which is harder than it looks! 720 levels across three modes to master.

Test your skills and join Santa’s adventure! When you’re stuck, use a hint.

Are you up for the challenge?

Features
• 3 game modes, each with 240 levels. Altogether there are 720 levels.
• This is the complete game that includes the original game and all the add the DLC.
• Christmas based fun for the whole family.
